data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: This is with reference to our letter dated May 01, 2022 regarding the 4Q FY 22 investor presentation made available on our company's website. In this regard, we would like to inform you that in the said presentation, on the slide no. 9, the legend/label for the 'Casualwear' & 'Outerwear' under the 'product category sales' chart was interchanged inadvertently. We have made the necessary modification in slide no. 9 and uploaded the same on our website www.gokaldasexports.com and can be downloaded on the following link:https://www.gokaldasexports.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Investor-Presentation-4QFY22-Gokaldas-Exports.pdfInconvenience caused in this regard is highly regretted. Request you to take the same on records.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Today - 21St January, 2022
data.news_body:
Reference to the captioned subject, the Board of Directors at their meeting held today, have inter-alia approved the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2021 as per IND AS along with the Limited Review Report.

Copy of the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2021 along with Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors M/s. MSKA & Associates, Chartered Accountants is enclosed for your information and record.

The meeting commenced at 11:30 AM and concluded at 12:50 PM

Kindly acknowledge the receipt and take note.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Today - 29Th October, 2021
data.news_body:
1. Reference to the captioned subject, the Board of Directors at their meeting held today, have inter-alia approved the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 as per IND AS along with the Limited Review Report.

Copy of the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 along with Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors M/s. MSKA & Associates, Chartered Accountants is enclosed for your information and record.

2. The Board of Directors have approved to explore the opportunity of setting-up of Manufacturing Unit overseas and authorized the Managing Director for the same.

The meeting commenced at 12:05 PM and concluded at 1:15 PM

Kindly acknowledge the receipt and take note.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Today - 14Th May, 2021
data.news_body:
We enclose herewith the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 along with the Independent Auditors Report issued by the Statutory Auditors, M/s. MSKA & Associates (Firm Registration number: 105047W)
We declare that the Auditor's Report is issued with unmodified/unqualified opinion on Annual Audited Results of the Company (Standalone and Consolidated) for year ended March 31, 2021
The Board appointed Mr. G Balu and Associates, Chartered Accountants, (Firm Registration number:000376S/S200073), as the Internal Auditor of the Company for the financial year 2021-22. Brief profile is enclosed below as Annexure 1.
The Board appointed Mr. Nagendra D Rao, Practising Company Secretary as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the financial year 2021-22. Brief profile is enclosed below as Annexure 2.
The meeting commenced at 1:15 PM and concluded at 4:30 PM

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Today - 14Th May, 2021
data.news_body:
We enclose herewith the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 along with the Independent Auditors Report issued by the Statutory Auditors, M/s. MSKA & Associates (Firm Registration number: 105047W)
We declare that the Auditor's Report is issued with unmodified/unqualified opinion on Annual Audited Results of the Company (Standalone and Consolidated) for year ended March 31, 2021
The Board appointed Mr. G Balu and Associates, Chartered Accountants, (Firm Registration number:000376S/S200073), as the Internal Auditor of the Company for the financial year 2021-22. Brief profile is enclosed below as Annexure 1.
The Board appointed Mr. Nagendra D Rao, Practising Company Secretary as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the financial year 2021-22. Brief profile is enclosed below as Annexure 2.
The meeting commenced at 1:15 PM and concluded at 4:30 PM
